titleStmt.title: A dying fathers living legacy, to his loving son or, lively rules from the rule of life, to bee lived by every mothers childe. / By F.S. Gent.
titleStmt.author: F. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the authour, and are to bee sold by Elisha Wallis at the gilded Horse-shooe in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: The final leaf has "The dying fathers living legacy" printed vertically.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the gilded Horse-shooe in the Old Bayley
